activities:
It is EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC.'s policy to respect and protect Personal Information collected or maintained by or on behalf of EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC.. In furtherance of our commitment, EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. will certify its adherence to the US-EU Safe Harbor Agreement and the US-Swiss Safe Harbor Framework regarding Personal Information collected in the European Economic Area (EEA) in support of EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC.'s commercial operations. EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. adheres to the Safe Harbor privacy principles and the "Frequently Asked Questions" document, as agreed to by the U.S. Department of Commerce and the European Commission.
Scope
This Safe Harbor Statement sets forth the principles under which EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. manages the processing of Personal Information that it may receive from its customers and vendors in the EEA in support of its commercial operations. In connection with EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC.'s commercial operations, including but not limited to fulfillment of orders, website and e-mail communications, and customer service, EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. may now and/or in the future transfer or provide access to Personal Information regarding citizens of the EEA outside of the EEA.

recoursemech:
If you feel that EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. is not abiding by this Safe Harbor Statement or is not in compliance with the Safe Harbor principles, please contact  EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. at the contact information provided below. In addition, EXECUTIVE MEETINGS & INCENTIVES, INC. has agreed to cooperate with  JAMS regarding dispute resolution.  EMI cooperates and complies with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
